name: IT System Engineer Digitalization (m/f/d)
description:
• Setting up and maintaining new installations for our customers
  • Design and Administration of the Costumer new digital solutions
  • Testing of UI/UE environment for customers
  • Administration and Monitoring of API Connectivity
  • Administration and monitoring of datacenter and client system
  • Administration of MDM system
  • Support for issues in the environment
  • Correct administration of incidents in ticketing system
  • Autonomous and fast learner for complex infrastructure  
  • Participating in the standby
  • MCSA, better MCSE certificated
  • Linux certification would be an advantage
  • More than 5 years of experience as Windows system engineer
  • More than 3 years of experience in an international team and as system engineer
  • Extensive experience in managing mobile devices, migrating to hybrid cloud environments, and managing API connectivity.
  • Experience with Grafana
  • Experience with Monitoring Systems
  • Good knowledge of Linux
  • Good interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills in German and English
  • Technical documentation skills
  • Modern, centrally located office: Just a 5-minute walk from Bahrenfeld station - easy access guaranteed!
  • Open corporate culture: Immerse yourself in an international working environment where ideas and diversity are encouraged.
  • Collegial working atmosphere: Enjoy a working atmosphere characterized by collaboration and a hands-on mentality
  • Hybrid working model: Flexibility - combine on-site and home office work.
  • 30 days holiday: More time for relaxation and leisure. Additional days off on 24 December, 31 December and half a day on your birthday.
  • Attractive remuneration package: We reward your performance appropriately.
  • Sodexo vouchers: For carefree catering while you work.
  • HVV season ticket or underground car park subsidy: Support for your convenient journey.
  • JobRad: Take advantage of the opportunity to lease a JobRad after your probationary period.
  • Company pension scheme: With a generous 25% employer contribution of up to €75.
